1	Justice Society of America

3	Teen Titans

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Set Operators */

SELECT
    name
FROM 
    demo.supers AS s INNER JOIN
    demo.supersteams AS st ON s.id = st.superid
WHERE 
    st.teamid = 1 
UNION
SELECT 
    name
FROM 
    demo.supers AS s INNER JOIN
    demo.supersteams AS st ON s.id = st.superid
WHERE 
    st.teamid = 2

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Table Value Constructor */

SELECT 
    name, rescues
FROM 
    demo.supers AS s INNER JOIN
    demo.supersteams AS st ON s.id = st.superid
WHERE 
    st.teamid = 1
UNION
values ('Super Developer', 0)

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
name	rescues
The Flash	297
Super Developer	0

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Aggregate function */

SELECT 
    t.name, sum(rescues) 
FROM 
    demo.supers AS s INNER JOIN
    demo.supersteams AS st ON s.id = st.superid INNER JOIN
    demo.teams AS t ON st.teamid = t.id
GROUP BY 
    t.name;

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
name	sum(rescues)
Justice League of America	1085
Justice Society of America	297
Teen Titans	247

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Rollup */

SELECT 
    t.name, sum(rescues), avg(rescues)
FROM 
    demo.supers AS s INNER JOIN
    demo.supersteams AS st ON s.id = st.superid INNER JOIN
    demo.teams AS t ON st.teamid = t.id
GROUP BY 
    t.name
WITH ROLLUP;
